page.title: 04Changing Times.
page.content: An interview was conducted with Mrs E.Jones; A lady who has lived in Pencombe Village all of her life. The following information was given: "There have been a number of changes over the years. To day we have much more traffic on our roads. Quite an increase in the number of cars-motor-bikes and lorries also tractors and trailers.They take quite a toll of our roads and over latter years they have not had so much attention as perhaps one would like. A recent new addition is the notification of the thirty mile per hour limit through the immediate village. We do not enjoy such a good Bus service as in years gone by,again most people own their own cars today so a regular service would of course be
